name: You Only Get 1
description:
A game made for the GDJam 21 game jam.

You Only Get 1 is a single mini-game mini-game collection.
With the game jam's theme being "You Only Get One", there are a lot of 1s, especially in the single mini-game.

Mini-game(s):
- Flood of Erasure: A remake of a Java project from grade 11. You are the only one in the way of a stampede of creatures from the void. See how long you can last, armed with a sword that can project attacks forward, but only once at a time.
